name: RoomJump (nwlynx)
description:
Warning: This game is not complete

The main reason I made this game is to test out and idea I had for a platformer.

One where the player to move to other portions of the map, can dash into walls and move the rooms around itself.

I plan to add more content to this, and I would love to be inspired if you had an idea or suggestion.

Thanks for Playing :)
